name: Director Monogatari
overview: You can be the star-maker! It's a great success with a brilliant debut song at number one, It's a game. Since its launch, this has been a fun and well-received music industry role-playing game. We promise you will be overwhelmed by the fun graphics. More than 4 industry maps and witty messages, and more than 360 endings by Mr. Kung Fu Nakano. A good plan unique to a record company that has been scooped out nakedly. The director's secret life, a story that cannot be told without laughter and tears Behind the birth of an idol who is active in the brilliant spotlight. Make the star shine brightly!
